title: Java Developer (m/w/d) - ISG Personalmanagement
subtitle: Brunn am Gebirge, Nö 2345
body:
Unsere Recruitingprojekte laufen weiter. Wir freuen uns auf Ihre Bewerbung und die Aktualisierungen Ihrer Angaben im ISG-Karriereportal!

Wir sind uneingeschränkt im Home-Office verfügbar.


Our customer is a leading company in the area of Mobile Payment, Messaging and Mobile Ticketing and has its headquarter south of Vienna. For the Development-Team we are searching a

Java Developer (m/w/d)


Your main tasks:
  • Developing the JAVA-based payment platform
  • Evaluation of new technologies
  • Creativity and innovation while introducing and implementing the new product landscape (with microservices)
  • Be part of the active team; cooperate to establish modern, agile software processes
  • Understanding client requirements and user stories and how they translate in application features

We expect:
  • At least 3 years’ experience in JAVA EE (minimum JAVA 8) and/or frameworks such as Spring Boot
  • Solid understanding of software development lifecycle including agile development
  • Stable knowledge of Clean Code
  • Great willingness to learn and develop further in order to build microservices architectures
  • Furthermore, you convince through your cooperative, team-oriented approach with openness for new things, high quality standards and true service orientation
  • Experience with Spring Boot, Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes, Redis, MongoDb
  • Good understanding of technologies such as ElasticSearch, Logstash, Kibana, Grafana, Prometheus
  • Very good English knowledge (spoken and written)

The company offers you:
  • A challenging and international career
  • Flexible working hours and a pleasant, relaxed working atmosphere with a flat hierarchy
  • An attractive salary package with a gross anual salary of at least € 55.000,- with the possibility of overpayment dependent on qualification and experience

If you are interested in this challenging position please apply under the number 79.217 via ISG-Karriereportal or via eMail.

Visit ISG on: www.isg.com/jobs - hier finden Sie täglich neue Jobangebote.
ISG Personalmanagement GmbH
A-1220 Wien, Hans-Steger-Gasse 10. Top 7-9
Mag. Robert Liska, T: +43 1 512 35 05-54
@: bewerbung.liska@isg.com
BEWERBEN
